be.schilduil.games.tekris
Class TeKrisBoard

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--be.schilduil.games.tekris.TeKrisBoard
public class TeKrisBoard
extends java.lang.Object

The TeKrisBoard class represents board of the TeKris game written for www.tentenkamp.be (TK in short, hence the T.K...).

Website

http://www.schilduil.be/java/TeKris.html

(package private)  double lineFactor
          Factor for multiple lines: points = linePoints * exp(#lines, lineFactor) e.g. 0.0 => lines: 1,2,3,... => points: 1*,1*,1*,...

          Points you get per line

          The padding of the gridBoard with its container, there will be an extra border of 1 pixel

linePoints

int linePoints
Points you get per line

lineFactor

double lineFactor
Factor for multiple lines: points = linePoints * exp(#lines, lineFactor) e.g. 0.0 => lines: 1,2,3,... => points: 1*,1*,1*,... e.g. 1.0 => lines: 1,2,3,... => points: 1*,2*,3*,... e.g. 2.0 => lines: 1,2,3,... => points: 1*,4*,9*,... e.g. 3.0 => lines: 1,2,3,... => points: 1*,8*,27*,... e.g. -1.0 => lines: 1,2,3,... => points: 1*,1/2*,1/3*,...
